perturbation.original_text: Oceanic Time Warner Cable agrees to not edit or modify the above content.
perturbation.changed_text: Oceanic Time Warner Cable agrees to not edit or modify the above content, except for minor technical adjustments necessary for broadcast.
perturbation.explanation: The original text strictly prohibits any editing. The changed text introduces an exception for 'minor technical adjustments,' creating ambiguity. This contradicts the initial absolute prohibition and can lead to disputes over what constitutes a 'minor technical adjustment'.

perturbation.original_text: Watchit shall have the exclusive right to sell third party advertising as sponsors of their content and will have the right to brand the content under the Watchit brand and place a “bug” on the screen identifying the content with a Watchit trademark.
perturbation.changed_text: Watchit shall have the right to sell third party advertising as sponsors of their content and will have the right to brand the content under the Watchit brand and place a “bug” on the screen identifying the content with a Watchit trademark. Oceanic Time Warner Cable reserves the right to approve all advertising content and branding elements, which will not be unreasonably withheld.
perturbation.explanation: The original text grants Watchit 'exclusive right' to sell advertising. The modified text adds a clause where Oceanic Time Warner Cable retains approval rights over advertising content. This directly contradicts the 'exclusive right' provision, making it unclear whether Watchit can unilaterally decide on advertisers, or whether Oceanic has a veto power. This creates a conflicting definition of 'exclusive'.

perturbation.original_text: Ocean Time Warner Cable will be able to not include any content that it deems inappropriate or distasteful.
perturbation.changed_text: Ocean Time Warner Cable will be able to not include any content that it deems inappropriate or distasteful. However, Oceanic Time Warner Cable will broadcast a minimum of 80% of the content provided by Watchit.
perturbation.explanation: The original text gives Oceanic Time Warner Cable complete discretion to exclude content. The modified text adds a requirement to broadcast a minimum percentage of Watchit's content. This creates a direct conflict: Oceanic cannot simultaneously have unlimited discretion to exclude content and be obligated to broadcast a minimum amount, leading to uncertainty over enforcement of either provision.
